title: Station master arrested after dozens killed in Greece train crash
summary: The two trains which collided early on Wednesday were left running on the same track, a government spokesman said.

title: Survivors describe 'nightmarish seconds' as trains crashed
summary: Passengers smashed windows to escape burning carriages after two trains collided in central Greece.

title: At the crash site of 'no hope' - BBC reporter in Greece
summary: Kostas Koukoumakas takes a look at the devastation after two trains collided in northern Greece.

title: Covid origin likely China lab incident - FBI chief
summary: Other US agencies have come to different conclusions from the FBI on how the pandemic began.

title: Ruling party wins Nigeria's presidential election
summary: Bola Tinubu, 70, is declared the winner of Nigeria's election despite opposition calls for a rerun.

title: Ed Sheeran says wife developed tumour in pregnancy
summary: The health scare and the death of his friend Jamal Edwards sent Sheeran "spiralling" into depression.

title: Uranium particles enriched to 83.7% found in Iran
summary: A watchdog is discussing with Iran the purity of the particles, which is very close to weapons grade.

title: Twitter back after two-hour outage affected tweets
summary: The problems came two days after the social media company reportedly laid off 200 employees.

title: Ancient mummy found in delivery man's bag
summary: The Peruvian man said he wanted to show off the mummy, which is at least 600 years old, to his friends.

title: Finland starts construction of Russia border fence
summary: The Finnish government has sought to boost border security since Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

title: Daily walk prevents one in 10 early deaths - study
summary: Doing some exercise - as little as 11 minutes a day - is better than doing nothing, researchers say.

title: World Cup record holder Fontaine dies
summary: Just Fontaine, who holds the record for the most goals scored at a single World Cup, dies at the age of 89.

title: Bieber cancels remaining Justice world tour dates
summary: The 29-year-old Canadian singer has previously postponed the tour several times due to ill health.

title: Denmark scraps holiday to boost defence budget
summary: The extra day of work will provide an additional $400m to the economy.
